title.rendered: Attock 2024 AJK Regimental Center Admin Clerical Posts

content.rendered:
Attock 2024 AJK Regimental Center Admin Clerical Posts. The AJK Regimental Center is looking for candidates for the following positions as advertised in the daily Nawaiwaqt Newspaper of August 20, 2024:
LDC (lower division clerk)
Matriculation is preferred.
AJK Regimental Center is now accepting applications for the latest Government Admin-Clerical jobs and others until 25 October 2024 or as per the closing date in the newspaper ad. To find out how to apply for the latest AJK Regimental Center jobs, read the complete ad online. The jobs are at the Pakistan Army department in Attock.

Attock 2024 AJK Regimental Center Admin Clerical Posts

Date Posted: 20 August, 2024
Last Date: 25 October, 2024
Sector: Government
Newspaper: Nawaiwaqt Jobs
Education: Matric
Location: Attock, Punjab, Pakistan
Organization: AJK Regimental Center
Job Industry: Admin Clerical Jobs
Type: Full Time
Job Experience: 2 Years

Latest Job In September 2024

  • Qatar Jobs 2024 New Brand Manpower Management
  • Latest Private Company Peshawar Classified Jobs August 2024
  • Vacancies at Rising Star International Technical Training Center Abu Dhabi 2024
  • Qatar 2024 Pakistan International School Advertisement
  • Abu Dhabi 2024 Essential Manpower Consultant EMC Management Job

Latest Private Jobs in Attock, Punjab, Pakistan September 2024.
Apply Before the last date of this Job. Government Company Job only for Attock, Punjab, Pakistan. Full-time jobs in Attock, Punjab, Pakistan as a Government company This ad shared by Nawaiwaqt Jobs
The required Education for this Government company is Matric. Minimum Salary starts from 650000 Rs to 85000 Rs Per Month. For More Information please visit the photo ad & the official website of Government Company September 2024.

How to apply?

Apply as per the job advertisement details. Login to view further details of how to register via https://www.jobz.pk online. Note: Beware of fraudulent recruiting activities. If an employer asks for money, do not pay, and report it to us via the Contact Us form. Follow the instructions & dates in the official job ad when applying. Govt jobs may not be applied online. Human typing errors are possible. Error & omissions excepted.
